text: Aleksandr Remmovich Melentyev (, born June 27, 1954 in Penza, died Feb 16, 2015 in Bishkek) was a Soviet/Kyrgyz sport shooter. He competed in the 1980 Summer Olympics (where he won a gold medal) and in the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==Other websites== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:1980 Summer Olympics Category:1988 Summer Olympics Category:Kyrgyzstani people Category:Russian sportspeople Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Sport shooters
title: Aleksandr Melentyev
